前提是所有的dubbo应用一定都升级到新版dubbo 2.7.3吗？
在同一注册中心，有部分dubbo应用用老版2.5.5版本，部分应用使用新版dubbo2.7.3的解决方案吗？
有这两个版本兼容性的案例吗

我的目的是对某个接口做超时配置,我用的是spring的properties文件,没有xml的consumer配置.
但我这么用无效.请求帮助/...
哦，我自己改了`CustomReferenceConfig`, `Thread.currentThread().setContextClassLoader(interfaceClass.getClassLoader());`  就可以啦

Hi.

You should complete details of your scenario.
* inside/outside JVM
* Why save it to mysql

And in most cases it depends on actual environment and purpose. You can do it in various ways.
So what about using `@EnableDubbo` and `@Reference` for replacement?

> So what about using `@EnableDubbo` and `@Reference` for replacement?

@Reference(version = "1.0")
private IMyService myService;

becourse i don't want update my code.
i want use other way to do it.
like config properties file.
thank you!
thank you very much！！

1. Create `dubbo.properties`.
2. Specify reference config for a certain interface. Eg, 
`dubbo.reference.org.apache.dubbo.demo.DemoService.timeout=500`.
I test locally and it worked.
provider修改序列化协议重启消费端需要重启吗
amazing result

But I'm transmitting big files.i need use hessian protocol,Is the Hessian protocol unsupported?Is there any other way?
thank you.

I think you better limit the file upload size in web container, not by dubbo.
Similar issue dicussed here #2813
thank you for your time,i was find other way to limit that files size.

@maslke  I have checked this issue,  

the reason is that when you did not set dubbo:service id,   the service will use the default bean name as Path  (interface name) with Increase id ,  so the one path is com....GreetingService, another is  com....GreetingService2，the path does not equal with the consumer (com....GreetingService) so failed.  

but when set dubbo:service id, will not use the bean name
the path set in the class ServiceBean#309

I'm not clearly sure that is a bug.

[nacos-spring-boot-project](https://github.com/nacos-group/nacos-spring-boot-project/wiki/spring-boot-0.2.3-%E4%BB%A5%E5%8F%8A-0.1.3-%E7%89%88%E6%9C%AC%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%9F%E8%83%BD%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E6%89%8B%E5%86%8C) 已经支持

场景：物流业务系统
Will repair soon.

> @maslke I have checked this issue,
> 
> the reason is that when you did not set dubbo:service id, the service will use the default bean name as Path (interface name) with Increase id , so the one path is com....GreetingService, another is com....GreetingService2，the path does not equal with the consumer (com....GreetingService) so failed.
> 
> but when set dubbo:service id, will not use the bean name
> the path set in the class ServiceBean#309
> 
> I'm not clearly sure that is a bug.

thanks.perhaps always set id is the best practice.

we meet this issue at my company too.  I will send a pr to inspire to fix this problem

这么做的话，zookeeper上短时间内删除和增加相同的节点会导致所有机器重新subcribe这些节点，会不会网络波动有点大？

@chickenlj 另外，不建议用 Set<MethodModel> 来存储 MethodModel，否则每次遍历都会生成一个 Iterator 对象，浪费内存。
[ServiceModel.java#L87](https://github.com/apache/dubbo/blob/c48c5cfa1d9fe05fb6c3f5198638eb260759a8a2/dubbo-rpc/dubbo-rpc-api/src/main/java/org/apache/dubbo/rpc/model/ServiceModel.java#L87)

can set timeout larger? @chickenlj

所有的demo项目都在dubbo-demo项目下
> https://github.com/apache/dubbo/tree/master/dubbo-demo
我觉得这是基于装饰者模式考虑的，HeaderExchangeChannel 的职责就是用Request对象包装请求体，但是如果之前已经有装饰器对请求体做过包装了，那就没必要再包装一层了，这是我的理解，不知道正不正确

> 这么做的话，zookeeper上短时间内删除和增加相同的节点会导致所有机器重新subcribe这些节点，会不会网络波动有点大？

谢谢反馈，但是没明白你的意思，这个改动只是新增了在节点被删除后对内部已订阅节点的缓存的清理，我觉得这是符合逻辑的，至于你说的上下线导致的网络流量过大这个问题，是zookeeper作为注册中心一直有的问题，和pr应该没啥直接联系。

`Optional` is more readable, but it may cause performance issue. 

Some related info:

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/54443944/gc-overhead-of-optionalt-in-java
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/34696884/performance-of-java-optional

I also did a search in github, spring and hibernate use `optional`
https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/blob/21f1b3a79d1c2168aa0088e45368f3f75957b22c/spring-boot-project/spring-boot-actuator-autoconfigure/src/main/java/org/springframework/boot/actuate/autoconfigure/web/servlet/CompositeHandlerAdapter.java#L56
https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/blob/ad6231ad2989ca5428bb51afdf48a9112710ce1d/spring-core/src/main/java/org/springframework/core/annotation/MissingMergedAnnotation.java#L103
https://github.com/hibernate/hibernate-orm/blob/79a8f43ba57d9e4a1269c5027dfd063b18d4f7d9/hibernate-core/src/main/java/org/hibernate/bytecode/enhance/internal/bytebuddy/ByteBuddyEnhancementContext.java#L88

It's more like a trade off.

And also if we choose not use Optional, I suggest add related rule in checkstyle check

Yeah, it's a trade off. We can use `Optional` in non-critical paths to improve code readability. But, using `Optional` in critical paths increases the pressure on the GC.

Spring, Hibernate and Dubbo are different types of frameworks, and their workloads are very different. Dubbo carries thousands of requests per second, which requires higher performance stability, so maybe `! = null` is a better choice.

dubbo使用的是zk client连接，zookeeper acl的设置生效与否dubbo无法控制。
建议如果问题无法排除，可以使用java zk client直接连接测试，判断问题所在。

2.7.x 和 2.6.x 是目前社区提供支持的版本，二者是可以兼容的。
 参考 http://dubbo.apache.org/zh-cn/docs/user/versions/version-270.html ，理论上对于低版本也是功能兼容的。

建议在测试环境先行测试，再迁移到生产环境。

理论上二者没有关联也不会有冲突。
是否有例子可以重现相关问题？如果可以稳定重现的话，建议附上相关例子重新开一个issue

it's reasonable to have zookeeper acl which required two different zk client.
my personal view is dubbo should support this

zk集群是支持多用户的，不同的用户访问不同的path。
所以，我之前的解法也不太对，建议使用：**zk集群地址** + **username** + **password** = 唯一key。

This error was caused by Spring Cloud Feign design, every `@FeignClient` will generate a Feign proxy with a new child Spring `ApplicationContext` that may be refreshed before its' parent `ApplicationContext`. If any Dubbo service bean annotated `@Service` was scanned by the child context, this Dubbo `ServiceBean` also will be initialized and it's no guarantee its dependent Spring beans are ready in that time, thus there are two ways to resolve this issue :

1. Avoid Dubbo `@Service` Bean to register into the child context
2. Via the `contextId` attribute of `@FeignClient` to specify the Spring Boot server `ApplicationContext`
